item.title: gitignore.io - Generating Complex Git Ignore Files Automatically
item.author: arun@arunmozhi.in (Arunmozhi)
item.description: My way of generating .gitignore files has evolved over time. First it was just adding files and folder names manually to a empty file called .gitignore. Then as more and more people started sharing their dotfiles, I started using copies of it. One most used resource for me is the Github gitignore Repository .
